TEXT.S: Lithuania Itini i 56 00 N, 24 00 E, noYoropi ko Lithuania. Polong no sekalay i 65,300 sq km "saka 123 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 62,680 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 2,620 sq km " Polong i 2,854,235 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 44.80 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 34.60 , malo no roma to a sera 20.60 . siyoto O [[[Vilnius]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakatosa 16 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Dalia Grybauskait , patirengan a romi'ad i 2009 a miheca saka 7 folad saka 12 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
